description:
Throughout Season 8 of "Doctor Who" it was rumored that Jenna Coleman was preparing to exit the series. In the end it never came to pass, but showrunner Steven Moffat is finally setting the record straight.《神秘博士》第八季一直有传言说Jenna Coleman她有可能会离开剧组。不过到最后这个传言也没有城镇，不过最近《神秘博士》制片人Steven Moffat终于跟大家分享了这个消息。

In an interview with Doctor Who Magazine, via Radio Times, he reveals Coleman was originally going to leave during the Season 8 finale, "Death in Heaven." 据《Radio Times》报道，在接受《神秘博士》杂志采访时，Moffat透露Coleman本来是要在第八季结局的时候“死在天堂”的。

"That was her last episode," Moffat says. "And then she asked me if she could be in Christmas? So I said, 'Okay, I'll write you out in Christmas.' She came to the read-through and did the 'write out' version -- and again changed her mind."“本来那是她的最后一集，”Moffat说。“后来她问我，可不可以让她参与圣诞特辑？然后我说‘可以呀，我会让你在圣诞那一集离开。’然后我就写了一版她离开的剧本——然后再一次她改变了我的想法。”

That's twice Coleman nearly left the series before changing her mind at the last minute. Luckily, Moffat was pleased she had second thoughts. "The truth is I never wanted her to go. I didn't really want 'Death in Heaven' to be her last episode," he says. "And with 'Last Christmas,' I'd already written the alternative version where she stayed, and I preferred that version."这是那两次Coleman差点离开的情况，不过现在她有了不同的想法。Moffat很高兴她可以换个思路想这件事。“我从来都不想让她了离开。我真的不希望《Dead in Heaven》是她的最后一集，”他说。“在《Last Christmas》的圣诞特辑也是，我本来都定好剧本了，不过我还是喜欢后来的剧本。

Now, Clara will become the longest-tenured companion of the modern "Doctor Who" era. Coleman confirmed in December that she would stick around through the end of Season 9.现在，Clara已经是件《神秘博士》现代版里的超级老人了。Coleman在12月时确认她将会一直在第九季中出现直到第九季结局。
